experiences.summary: Automated clinical data processing and reporting systems, delivering significant efficiency improvements in medical coding workflows.
experiences.challenge: Manual patient report classification into CDC/NCHS medical codes was creating inefficiencies, taking excessive time and resulting in 27% inconsistent accuracy across clinical coding workflows.
experiences.solution: Engineered automated classification pipeline using Python and PySpark, developed data validation scripts, and created interactive Tableau dashboards for quality tracking.
responsibilities: Automated patient report classification into CDC/NCHS medical codes
Developed Python-based data validation and standardization scripts
Optimized large-scale data processing with PySpark and SQL
Designed interactive Tableau dashboards for data quality tracking
Collaborated with analytics teams on end-to-end automation solutions
achievements: Delivered automated solution that processed thousands of clinical records
Improved data quality across entire healthcare coding system
Created dashboards used daily by medical coding teams

experiences.challenge: Quality assurance for automotive drive shaft production relied on manual inspection of 50,000+ images, leading to delayed defect detection and increased production downtime.
experiences.solution: Developed CNN-based automated defect detection system, streamlined data preprocessing with PySpark and Snowflake, and built real-time analytics dashboards.
responsibilities: Analyzed 50K+ QA inspection images to identify early material flaws
Automated defect-detection pipelines using Python and CNNs
Streamlined data preprocessing workflows with PySpark and Snowflake
Designed Streamlit QA dashboards for production trend visualization
Developed IoT proof-of-concept for real-time defect classification
impact: Reduced production failures and equipment downtime
Enabled near real-time analytics across manufacturing systems
Enhanced cross-team collaboration through visual dashboards
Demonstrated scalability for smart manufacturing analytics

Processed and analyzed over 50,000 inspection images
